api_list.api_description: Retrieve metadata for an Archive.org item.

required_parameters.name: item_id
required_parameters.description: The identifier for the Archive.org item.

api_list.api_description: Returns a list of all police forces available via the API except the British Transport Police.

query: I am researching UK police forces and want to find historical records related to them on Archive.org. What metadata is available for an item with ID 'popeye_taxi-turvey'? Additionally, can you list all the police forces in the UK available via the API?
